channel.title: Chat Above Heads
channel.description:
Ok, im trying to figure out how to make npc chat above their heads and like when you do a command it says chat above your OWN head, not other people like, ::hail Help?
Edit: found out how to change chat above players heads when you do a command.

item.title: Chat Above Heads
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

To do NPCâ€™s go to NPChandler.java and search for your NPC code.
Here is an Example:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 1063) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome to Warrior's Paradise!"; } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 3844) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Danger your entering Wildy!"; }

Read full topic
